transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Vishal ji se baat ho rahi meri?
Customer: Vishal ji se baat ho rahi meri?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Haan ji sir Abhishek baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Kaise hain sir?
Executive: Boliye na sir main theek hu. Boliye boliye.
Customer: Main baat main ye kar raha hu sir service aapne use karna chhod diya koi problem aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Aapne service use karna chhod diya IndiaMART koi problem aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Wo actually relevant lead aata nahi hai iski wajah se.
Executive: To sir aapne call karke bataya bhi nahi ki relevant lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Teen saal se main wahi bol raha hu sir aap dekho mera dimag mat khao subah subah aapko pata nahi hai hota kya hai. Theek hai?
Executive: Haan?
Executive: Mujhe sab pata hai sir ek baar aap.
Executive: Tumko pata hai to phir pehle leads aati hai ki wo dekho pehle uske baad mein baat karo. Haan? Mere ko kuch kaam dhandha nahi hai kya phone karke aapko batata rahu kya ho raha hai kya nahi ho raha hai. Ye aapka zimmedari hai na?
Executive: Mera zimmedari hai jab agar jab mujhe phone karke batayenge tab. Main abhi aapko.
Executive: Kya kar tumko phone karke batayenge tab hum batayenge na humko dusra kaam nahi hai kya? Hum paise tumko iske liye de rahe hai ki bhai hum aake tumko phone kare. Haan?
Executive: To sir hum phone karte hai phone hi kaha utha rahe phone hi kaha utha rahe hain?
Executive: Tumhe wahi bol raha hu na mujhe baki ke bhi kaam rehte hai sir ji aapke jo fake promises ho rahe hai hawa mein jo baatein hoti hai na uske liye time nahi hai mujhe. Theek hai?
Executive: Sir fake promise nahi ho rahe hai hum aapko.
Executive: Fake promise hi hai, fake promise hi hai. Fake promise hi hai.
Executive: Agar aap mujhe agar time denge na paanch se saat minute agar mujhe denge.
Executive: Main ho teen saal se time hi de raha hu. Teen saal se time hi de raha hu. Abhi mere pass time nahi hai. Main karta hu call mere ko zarurat rahega to. Theek hai?
Executive: Suniye to sir meri pehle baat ek.
Executive: Main call karunga aapko mere ko zarurat rahega tab.
Executive: Nahi sir meri baat samjh lijiye phir phone kaat dijiye.
Executive: Nahi sunni hai aapki baat.
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu agar mujhe paanch.
Executive: Mujhe nahi sunni hai sir aapki baat.
Executive: To phir sir kaise aapko bylead aayenge?
Executive: Haan? Aapko relatable bylead kaise aayenge jab baat hi nahi sun.
Executive: Wo main dekh lunga sir ji main aapko complaint kiya phone karke nahi na. Nahi aa rahi hai main nahi use karunga mujhe time waste nahi karna hai baat khatam. Haan? To aapko itna ye hai to aap aapke level pe karwa ke de do.
Executive: Hum apne hi level pe karwa ke denge us sara kuch.
Executive: Jab aane chalu ho jayengi tab aake dekhenge aap.
Executive: Theek hai?
Executive: To sir mujhe agar do minute ye to bata denge sir product detail kya hai iske baad aapko bylead agar na aaye phir iske baad aapko bolna.
Executive: Sir do din baad product badalta nahi hai mera. Theek hai? Fixed product hai. Usme kuch change nahi hoga. Theek hai? Jo hai wo hai. Lead aa rahi hai to aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai to nahi aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai aapki site ke liye baat khatam. Theek hai? Khali aapko kuch kaam dhandha nahi hai aapko 10 logo ko phone karke upar dikhana rehta hai kya kiya iski wajah se ye sab chal raha hai.
Executive: Suniye suniye.
Executive: Agar main aapko kaam karke du pura aapke catalog baat karenge phir?
Executive: Nahi kaam karne ke baad dekhenge. Dekhiye mere ko pehle saat lead hafte ka aane do uske baad mein baat karte hai na. Haan? Kitna lead ka promise hai aapka weekly?
Executive: Aapka catalog.
Executive: Kitna promise hai weekly?
Executive: 17 17.
Executive: 17 lead ka promise hai. Kaun se teen saal mein kaun se week mein 17 lead aayi hai batao mujhe mere product ki.
Executive: Aap aapko main batau aapko per day ek do ek bonus milta hai theek hai aur hafte ke 10 lead milta hai.
Executive: Are sir ji mera sawal samjhiye pehle. Haan?
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Ye aa jate ho kidhar se bhi uth ke aur samjhane lagte ho tumko jo script bataya wahi bolne lagte ho. Haan? Kitne saal se kaam kar rahe ho IndiaMART mein aap?
Executive: Are bataiye.
Executive: Mujhe do saal ho gaye.
Executive: Main kitne saal se join hui IndiaMART se?
Executive: Ek second main check kar le raha hu aap kitne saal se join hai.
Executive: IndiaMART aapki aap 2022 se hai.
Executive: Haan kitne saal ho gaye?
Executive: Teen saal ho gaye aapko.
Executive: Haan to phir aap tumse zyada experience hai mujhe IndiaMART ke bare mein. Theek hai? Script padhe hua baat mat karo.
Executive: Abhi script padh baat nahi kar rahe. Mujhe teen saal se teen saal mein 17 bylead kaun se week mein aayi hai batao.
Executive: Har week aapko 17 bylead milti ek daily ka bonus aata 10 bylead aise aapko milti hai.
Executive: Are sir ji jo mujhe cheez chahiye nahi wo milke fayda kya hai?
Executive: Achcha aapko jo bylead allot hoti hai yaha se matlab jo aap consume karne wale hai wo.
Executive: Main aapko kya bola abhi mujhe related bylead nahi aati hai. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek main abhi check kar raha hu aur jo ab mere mere.
Executive: Check karne ke baad baat karo na yaar tum kyu taklif dete ho re aadmi ko. Haan?
Executive: Sir taklif nahi de raha hu sir jab main puchhu.
Executive: Mujhe nahi karna hai. Main gaali dene se pehle phone rakhiye sir aap.
Executive: Sir meri ek second baat suniye iske baad.
Executive: Main gaali dene se pehle phone rakhiye sir aap.
Executive: Baat to suniye sir meri ek baar.
Executive: Sir main gaali dene se pehle phone rakhiye aap.
Executive: To aap gaali de lijiye aur kya bolu.
Executive: Teri maa ki chuth, behenchod phone rakh.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Feels executive is wasting his time.

- Accuses executive of making fake promises.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to understand the issue.

- Executive tried to explain the lead generation process.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer said he will call if needed.



Alert (If Any):

- abuse



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, fake promises, abuse
